titles.title: A bill for the relief of Mohamad Derani, Maha Felo Derani, and Tarek Derani.
A bill for the relief of Mohamad Derani, Maha Felo Derani, and Tarek Derani.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: Makes Mohamad Derani, Maha Felo Derani, and Tarek Derani each eligible for issuance of an immigrant visa or for adjustment of status to that of a lawful permanent resident of the United States under the Immigration and Nationality Act, upon payment of the required visa fees.
